overview: Since clerking for the Chief Judge of the United States District Court in Cleveland, Ohio, Bill Pinzler has practiced law in New York for 35 years. He began his career at Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver & Jacobson, working on, and trying, antitrust, securities and complex commercial cases. Since then he has worked with several smaller firms as well as independently focusing on various areas, geographies and types of contracts.
